protocol.name: P-GSE45677-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 RMA signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-2
protocol.text: A. thaliana seedlings were grown for 15 days after germination and then treated with GSH for 72 hrs befor used for array experiment

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-3
protocol.text: A. thaliana seedlings were grown for 15 days after germination and then used for experiment

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner 3000 7G.

protocol.name: P-GSE45677-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Expression Console and Gene springGX 12.1 using Affymetrix default analysis settings and RMA as normalization method used. The probes of intensities less than the 20.0 percentile in the raw data were excluded.
